name: Sluyo (pre-alpha)
description:
cuddly slime critters meet physics-puzzle action in this revolutionary new web experience! (cuddly slime critters pending.)

controlled using the mouse or touch screen, for now. surprisingly works pretty well on phones!

a game in progress by 💽 lynn and 🔋 q-lum for strawberryjam 2

💛💛💛 special thanks to jewel for sparkly unity wisdom and valerie for use of the font "vex chumps quickly" 💛💛💛
